
Use `arrow` for remote access to the database. 

### R 

```{r}
model_id <- "cb_prophet"
path <- "parquet/aquatics"
bucket <- "neon4cast-forecasts"
endpoint <- "https://data.ecoforecast.org"

fcst <- 
  glue::glue("{bucket}/{path}/model_id={model_id}") |>
  arrow::s3_bucket(endpoint_override = endpoint, anonymous = TRUE) |>
  arrow::open_dataset()
```
